content:
TERM: Authorized Access

DEFINITION:
Authorized Access: a virtual environment that can be used to store and manage sensitive information, and can be accessed only by authorized individuals

Authorized Access:

You are an authorized individual and have access to the Secure Container. You can view, edit, and manage the contents of the Secure Container.
